titleStmt.title: Iohn Niccols pilgrimage whrein [sic] is displaied the liues of the proude popes, ambitious cardinals, lecherous bishops, fat bellied monkes, and hypocriticall Iesuites.
titleStmt.author: Nicholls, John, 1555-1584?

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Dawson, for Thomas Butter, and Godfrey Isaac,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: * A-K L⁴ ² L M N⁶ O-R.
Running title reads: Iohn Nichols pilgrimage.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
